properties.name: locationId
properties.description: ID of location as stored in DB (or null)

properties.name: debug
properties.description: true if location recorded as part of debug

properties.name: time
properties.description: UTC time of this fix, in milliseconds since January 1, 1970.

properties.name: accuracy
properties.description: estimated accuracy of this location, in meters.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: speed if it is available, in meters/second over ground.

properties.name: altitude
properties.description: altitude if available, in meters above the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid.

properties.name: altitudeAccuracy
properties.description: accuracy of the altitude if available.

properties.name: coords
properties.description: A Coordinates object defining the current location

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: A timestamp representing the time at which the location was retrieved.
